meanings.sent1: The habitants of the small village gathered for a community meeting.
meanings.sent2: The habitants of the city enjoyed the annual parade.
meanings.sent3: The habitants of the forest threw a surprise party for the animals.
meanings.sent4: The habitants of the island were like a big family, always looking out for each other.
meanings.sent5: The habitants of the castle welcomed visitors with open arms.

meanings.definition: Those who reside in a specific area.
meanings.sent1: Many habitants of the neighborhood attended the block party.
meanings.sent2: The habitants of the apartment complex shared a sense of community.
meanings.sent3: The habitants of the dormitory organized a movie night for everyone.
meanings.sent4: The habitants of the town were like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent5: The habitants of the farm worked hard to harvest the crops.

meanings.definition: People who live in a certain location.
meanings.sent1: The habitants of the coastal town enjoyed the sea breeze.
meanings.sent2: Local habitants often frequented the nearby market.
meanings.sent3: The habitants of the mountain village threw a festival to celebrate the harvest.
meanings.sent4: The habitants of the desert oasis cherished every drop of water.
meanings.sent5: The habitants of the valley lived in harmony with nature.
